attributes.name: email
attributes.description: If `true`, the list will have a **email** style.

attributes.name: sticky-header
attributes.description: If `true`, the header will have a sticky effect.

attributes.name: users
attributes.description: If `true`, the list will have a **user** style.

attributes.name: company
attributes.description: The company name used by **user** list.

attributes.name: first-name
attributes.description: The first name used by **user** list.

attributes.name: last-name
attributes.description: The last name used by **user** list.

attributes.name: text-message
attributes.description: The message text used by **email** list

attributes.name: text-stamp
attributes.description: A stamp text for the message, used by **email** list.

attributes.name: text-subject
attributes.description: The subject text used by **email** list.

attributes.name: text-subtitle
attributes.description: The subtitle text's text for the list item.

attributes.name: text-title
attributes.description: The text title for the list item.

attributes.name: unread
attributes.description:
If `true`, a small rounded element, will be displayed on the left of the list
Used by **email** list.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: If `true`, the user cannot interact with the Swicth.
